accordion.description: Displays collapsible content panels for presenting information in a limited amount of space.

autocomplete.description: Lists suggested words as the user is typing.

button.description: Enhances a form with themable buttons.

draggable.description: Enables dragging functionality for any element.

droppable.description: Enables drop targets for draggable elements.

mouse.description: Abstracts mouse-based interactions to assist in creating certain widgets.

progressbar.description: Displays a status indicator for loading state, standard percentage, and other progress indicators.

resizable.description: Enables resize functionality for any element.

selectable.description: Allows groups of elements to be selected with the mouse.

slider.description: Displays a flexible slider with ranges and accessibility via keyboard.

sortable.description: Enables items in a list to be sorted using the mouse.

spinner.description: Displays buttons to easily input numbers via the keyboard or mouse.

tabs.description: Transforms a set of container elements into a tab structure.

tooltip.description: Shows additional information for any element on hover or focus.
